document.masterDocTitle: The Deltocephalinae leafhoppers of Pakistan (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Deltocephalinae leafhoppers of Pakistan (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks . From the original figures (clypellus shape and male genitalia) this species probably does not belong in
Parabolocratus
but the figures are too poor to place it to genus.

Described from a holotype male and one paratype from: Karachi, grass,
5 .xii. 1985
, Babar ( ZMUK ); no type specimens could be found.
